__e: And remember this, 20 years from now when we all own home computers and we all travel in electrical cars that move swiftly, high above our city that the key to the future, is keeping today alive forever!
They'll be delivering new computers, and then you can go back in, my little monkey.
I just wanted to work with computers and get paid for it.
Computers are inherently designed to make your lives easier.
Now, if computers are for art, and beauty, and global interconnectivity, why are they so ugly?
